saao/saa15/P313723
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}na-din-x x ina UGU pu-u-li o ša a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia x x x ina bat-ti-šu 01-et x+x x x x+x-su it-ta-x x x x ak ša₂-ni-x x x x x u₂-ru-ku x x x pu-u-lu ur-ki-u₂ x x x x x i-ša₂-an-ni x+x x x x x x-aš₂-ru ṣa x x x x x x ina UGU x x x x x x+x x+x x x x x x x x-ta an-nu-rig x x GIR₂-MEŠ AN.BAR x+x x x x na KA₂ i-su-ri o LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a a-ta-a x x x x x tu-še-ṣi x x x x x ta x x x x x x x x ṣa x x x x x x x x e-pu-uš x x x x x a-na-ṣar x x x x x x ina pa-an x+x x x x x ina ŠA₃ UD-MEŠ ša x x x ina ŠA₃ 01 GIN₂ 1/2 x x x x x+x ka na ir x x x x lu la u₂-ba-x x x x x x x x-na KUR-MEŠ x x x
